description: This file defines a React functional component named `BulkUploader`, which handles bulk file uploads (CSV/XLSX) for resources or costs. It includes logic for file parsing, validation, state management, and communication with backend endpoints to post bulk data, along with error handling and user interface rendering.

methods.name: acceptFor
methods.description: Returns a string of accepted file types (CSV and Excel formats) based on the upload kind.

methods.name: readFromLocalStorage
methods.description: Attempts to read a string value from localStorage for a given key, returning undefined if not available or on error.

methods.name: saveToLocalStorage
methods.description: Attempts to save a string value to localStorage for a given key, removing the key if the value is empty.

methods.name: getFirstQueryParam
methods.description: Retrieves the first non-empty value from the URL query parameters given a list of keys.

methods.name: ErrorList
methods.description: A React component that displays a list of row errors in an accessible region, collapsible details element.
